sentences.english: Head and neck are twisted in this position, which is bound to give you aches and pains.
sentences.chinese: 這種睡姿，你的脖子是彎曲的，會讓你感到疼痛。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the person of frequent seminal emission also should be careful this kind sleeps appearance accentuation illness.
sentences.chinese: 同時，頻繁遺精的人也要當心這種睡姿加重病情。

sentences.english: I began to shave baldheaded, today is no longer decided to position.
sentences.chinese: 我今天開始剃個光頭，就再也不用決定睡姿了。

sentences.english: Sometimes, he twists his body like this and rolling on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 有時，也會出現這種扭曲身體四腳朝天的睡姿。

sentences.english: The design according to human cervical spaces located concave shape, the balance should normally lie.
sentences.chinese: 根據人體頸椎設凹位造型，平衡睡姿。

sentences.english: On board, we are beginning to develop our own unique sleeping positions.
sentences.chinese: 在車上，我們開始培育自己獨特的睡姿。

sentences.english: Changing the position in which the snorer sleeps also helps.
sentences.chinese: 改變打鼾者的睡姿也會有所幫助。

sentences.english: People who sleep in starfish position are more likely to snore and to suffer from a poor night's sleep more often.
sentences.chinese: 海星睡姿的人更有可能打鼾，經常失眠。

sentences.english: However, the same sleep position is well known to aggravate snoring.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這種睡姿也是以加重打鼾而著名。

sentences.english: Your “sleep position” is the position you always move into right before falling asleep.
sentences.chinese: 你的“睡姿”通常就是你即將入睡之時擺好的姿勢。

sentences.english: This is the most common sleeping position in the UK. Sleeping like this can help repair wear and tear in the back.
sentences.chinese: 這種睡姿在英國最爲普遍，它有助於緩解背部勞累。

definition: to stretch oneself (on waking or when tired etc)
to stick one leg over the other (when sitting)
